meanings.definition: A small finch-like bird native to India.
meanings.sent1: The colorful amadavats chirped happily in the trees.
meanings.sent2: I saw a flock of amadavats flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to catch the amadavats but failed.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was as melodious as the sweet songs of amadavats.
meanings.sent5: The children were delighted to spot the tiny amadavats building nests.
